titleStmt.title: A diurnall of dangers. VVherein are manifested and brought to light, many great and unheard-of discoveries. To the admiration of all who have eares to heare, or strong hearts to endure. Found out and published in the yeare of just jealousies, apparant plots, fatall feares, and single securities. 1642. VVritten by T.J.
titleStmt.author: Jordan, Thomas, 1612?-1685?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
